title: Goerli: RPC method trace_filter crashed: runtime error: invalid memory address
body:
Hi Erigon Team, since v2.43.0 I'm experiencing trace filter crashes, same commands were working fine on v2.42.0:

#### System information

Erigon version: v2.43.0

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX

Commit hash: tag v2.43.0

Erigon Command (with flags/config): 

```
erigon --chain=goerli --authrpc.addr=0.0.0.0 --authrpc.jwtsecret=/data/common/jwt.hex --authrpc.port=8551 --http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool,ots --http.port=8545
```

Concensus Layer: lighthouse v4.1.0

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config):

```
lighthouse --network=goerli bn --execution-endpoint=http://127.0.0.1:8551 --execution-jwt=/data/common/jwt.hex --prune-payloads=false --slots-per-restore-point=8192
```

Chain/Network: Ethereum Goerli

#### Expected behaviour

```
curl --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"trace_filter","params":[{"fromBlock":"0x877F80","toBlock":"0x877F8A"}],"id":0}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST http://localhost:8545
```

Return trace

#### Actual behaviour

```
[EROR] [04-25|06:53:26.942] RPC method trace_filter crashed: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[service.go:217 panic.go:884 panic.go:260 signal_unix.go:837 stream.go:184 trace_filtering.go:384 value.go:586 value.go:370 service.go:222 handler.go:494 handler.go:444 handler.go:392 handler.go:223 handler.go:316 asm_amd64.s:1598] 
[WARN] [04-25|06:53:26.942] Served                                   conn=XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX: method=trace_filter reqid=1174 t=261.073Âµs err="method handler crashed
```
